titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning felts
Proclamations. 1623-09-17
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobalds, the seuenteenth day of September, in the one and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
